103.title: Punishment for murder
103.description: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.
103.punishment: Death or imprisonment for life, and fine

105.title: Punishment for culpable homicide not amounting to murder
105.description: Whoever commits culpable homicide not amounting to murder shall be punished appropriately based on the nature of the act.
105.offense: Culpable homicide not amounting to murder
105.punishment: Imprisonment for life, or up to 10 years, and fine

106.title: Causing death by negligence
106.description: Whoever causes death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide.
106.punishment: Up to 5 years imprisonment and fine; up to 10 years if by registered medical practitioner

80.title: Dowry death
80.description: Where the death of a woman is caused by any burns or bodily injury or occurs otherwise than under normal circumstances within seven years of her marriage.
80.punishment: Imprisonment not less than 7 years, may extend to life imprisonment

108.title: Abetment of suicide
108.description: If any person commits suicide, whoever abets the commission of such suicide.
108.punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment and fine

109.title: Attempt to murder
109.description: Whoever does any act with such intention or knowledge that if by that act caused death would be guilty of murder.
109.punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment and fine; life imprisonment if hurt caused

74.title: Assault or use of criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty
74.description: Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any woman intending to outrage her modesty.

63.title: Punishment for rape
63.description: Whoever commits rape shall be punished with rigorous imprisonment for a term not less than ten years.
63.punishment: Minimum 10 years RI, may extend to life imprisonment, and fine

303.title: Punishment for theft
303.description: Whoever commits theft shall be punished with imprisonment for a term which may extend to three years.
303.punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment, or fine, or both

309.title: Punishment for robbery
309.description: Whoever commits robbery shall be punished with rigorous imprisonment.
309.punishment: Up to 10 years RI and fine

316.title: Punishment for criminal breach of trust
316.description: Whoever commits criminal breach of trust shall be punished appropriately.
316.punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment, or fine, or both

318.title: Cheating
318.description: Whoever cheats and thereby dishonestly induces delivery of property.
318.punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine

85.title: Cruelty by husband or relatives
85.description: Whoever being the husband or relative of husband subjects woman to cruelty.
85.punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and fine

356.title: Defamation
356.description: Whoever makes or publishes any imputation concerning any person intending to harm reputation.
356.punishment: Up to 2 years simple imprisonment, or fine, or both

351.title: Criminal intimidation
351.description: Whoever commits the offence of criminal intimidation.
351.punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment, or fine, or both
